EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.London Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Cloud-Native Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are looking forward to seeing you tomorrow in London at the Cloud-Native Roadshow. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Date: Wednesday, May 31, 2017
Time: 8:30am - 4:00pm
Location: Pivotal 211 Old Street, 2nd Floor, London EC1V 9NR (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/211+Old+St,+London+EC1V+9NR,+UK/@51.5259343,-0.090919,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x48761ca61bf76b2d:0x89c21dcce87fd5a1!8m2!3d51.5259343!4d-0.0887303?hl=en]]>)
Agenda:
8:30am - 9:30am Registration & Breakfast 9:30am - 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm - 1:00pm Lunch 12:40pm - 1:00pm Presentations by our Ecosystem Partners 1:00pm - 3:45pm Sessions 3:45pm - 4:00pm Panel Q&A
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/london?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
Directions Scaffolding obscures sight lines to The Warehouse from the Old Street Roundabout, but if you persevere through the building site, youâ€™ll find us!
Step-by-Step Directions
- Exit Subway 4 from Old Street Tube Station - Walk up the ramp on your left - Immediately in front of you is an advertisement with "Ceviche" and "Maki"; walk past the sign towards a mini courtyard to the right - Our building's revolving doors are on your left - Enter the building, walk down past the coffee shop and you will find the elevators at the end; we are on the 2nd floor
